title: “Out Of Love” | Real Climate Science
cleaned_text:
Would she be proud about the other people she poisoned too, “out of love.”

“| will never regret the vaccine. Even if it turns out I injected actual poison and have only days to live. My heart and is was in the right place. I got vaccinated out of love, while antivaxxers did everything out of hate. If I have to die because of my love for the world, then so be it. But I will never regret or apologize for it.”
